root.name: Hammerin' Hero
root.description: OverviewThe basic style of the game.Hammerin' Hero is a game for the PlayStation Portable by Irem, that was released on April 7, 2009. Players are able to choose a job such as being a sushi chef or diver. There are two more playable characters that can be unlocked. The game features AD-HOC multi-player mode and dual language audio (English Japanese).JobsThe Job system in Hammerin' Hero allows the player to change his appearance, as well as the weapon that they use to smash foes with. Gen, the main character, is initially equipped with a large hammer under the job name of "Carpenter".
